TRACK.A: A boat or something sank (off) Cape Cod.
I think John is sick but I don't know for sure.
It seems that the teacher likes the movie.

UTTERANCE.NOTES: is POS for FUTURE Tense or Modal?

TRACK.A: Maybe the teacher will like the movie.
Of course John doesn't know the answer!
Of course John doesn't know the answer!

UTTERANCE.NOTES: Check gloss of FOR!! should it be FOR^FOR^ part:indef or FOR^part:indef or FORFOR^part:indef????? FMC also, check gloss for this sign

TRACK.A: What did mother buy a car for?
Why did mother buy a car?
According to John, it's going to rain tomorrow.
According to John, it's going to rain tomorrow.
According to John, it will rain tomorrow.
According to him/her the party starts at seven o'clock.
According to him/her the party starts at seven o'clock.

UTTERANCE.NOTES: is there any way to tell if the signer means 'a' book or 'the' book?
is there any way to tell if the signer means 'a' book or 'the' book?

TRACK.A: A/Some boat sank off Cape Cod (I think).
